review: Great item, easy to install and use for all members of the house. we use to use our Wii for Amazon and Netflix and our kids had a hard time having to input our Netflix information every time, with the Fire Tv Stick its easy for them to change from Netflix to Amazon shows
author: Justin D. Quinby

review: I really, really like this Fire TV stick.  I was very easy to install.  I love the way is goes into safe mode with beautiful pictures when you pause your movie.  It streams well.  I bought this stick for a 32 inch Sony flat screen.  I've had it only for two weeks and had only three pauses in the stream while watching a movie.  Great product!!
author: Sherry

review: Excellent.  I like the factor that it is small.  Also, the extender HDMI cable made connection to TV easy, without this cable, I would have need to purchase one because I did not have enough space to plug in the Fire TV stick.
author: Alphonso Powell
